sections.title: Communicating
sections.description: The skills required to communicate, collaborate, and share information i.e. using email or social media to communicate with friends, family or colleagues.

sections.title: Transacting
sections.description: The skills required to register and apply for services, buy and sell goods and services, and administer and manage transactions online i.e. using online banking or shopping online.

sections.title: Handling information & content
sections.description: The skills required to find, manage and store digital information and content securely i.e. saving your personal photos and videos online or using a ‘cloud’ service such as Microsoft 365 to create, share and collaborate with colleagues at work.

sections.title: Problem solving
sections.description: The skills required to find solutions to problems using digital tools and online services i.e. ‘Googling’ or using YouTube to find an answer or learn how to fix a problem.

sections.title: Being safe, legal, and confident online
sections.description: The skills required to stay safe, legal and confident online i.e. being able to use safe and strong passwords to keep your personal information secure online.

metrics.title: Being safe, legal, and confident online
metrics.questionMetric: Being Safe, Legal and Confident Online

questions.title: I can turn on a device
I can use the controls on a device
questions.description: Using a touchscreen, keyboard, mouse or trackpad

questions.title: I can use accessibility tools on my device to make it easier
questions.description: Volume settings, making text bigger, brightness settings

questions.title: I can interact with the home screen or desktop on my device
questions.description: Launching applications, finding ‘home’ or the desktop

questions.title: I can connect my device to a safe and secure internet connection
questions.description: Opening internet connection settings and connecting a secure network

questions.title: I know that my passwords and personal information must be kept safe as they have a value to others
questions.description: Sharing your password is like giving someone the keys to your house

questions.title: I can update and change my password when prompted to do so
questions.description: Understanding how to create a strong password and making changes to it if you need to
